name: serotina
description: Serotina online web store - a modern e-commerce platform

scripts.build: npm run build:shared && npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend
scripts.clean: rm -rf frontend/dist frontend/node_modules backend/dist backend/node_modules node_modules
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
